listitem.simpara: A query limit for the Univention Admin Diary has been added. The default limit of 1000 entries can be modified with the &ucsUCRV; admin/diary/query/limit (50531).
The package now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support (49169).
The packages univention-server-master and univention-server-backup now depend on the new package univention-ldap-config-master (49700).
Fixed symbolic link creation for host certificate (49036).

listitem.simpara: Move Python binding of univention-licence into separate package univention-licence-python and add Python 3 support (50943).
The LDAP overlay module k5pwd used the default Kerberos salt to check the password during simple-bind. We now use the correct salt, found in the k5key itself (50492).

The LDAP overlay slapo-lastbind can now be activated via the &ucsUCRV; ldap/overlay/lastbind which when activated stores the timestamp of an successful bind to an LDAP server. The script /usr/share/univention-ldap/univention_lastbind.py can be used to store the youngest of these timestamps, from all reachable LDAP servers, into the extended attribute lastbind of a specified user (49700).
Fixed a typo in the description of &ucsUCRV; ucs/server/languages/ (47845).

When accessing http(s)://FQDN/univention/udm/schema/ or http(s)://FQDN/univention/udm/openapi.json authentication is now required by default. ucr set directory/manager/rest/require-auth=no can be used to disable this. After setting this &ucsUCRV; the univention-directory-manager-rest service needs to be restarted (50732).
&ucsUMC; modules are now installed under Python 2 and/or Python 3 depending on what they provide (50332).
The How do I login? link on the login page can now be configured via the &ucsUCRV; umc/login/links/how_do_i_login/.* (50609).

SAML answers do not provide a usable password for UMC. Some UMC actions require specifically this password and so the UMC frontend asks for credentials before executing them. This fix stores the password across different UMC modules so that users need to enter their password only once per session (50670).
Fixed the logic to identify the main service container for multi-container apps (50969).
Minor fix that makes it easier to change the timeout between calls for the App Center listener converter (50967).
Fixed an issue where installation of apps on remote UCS systems would not work when using wildcard SSL certificates (50770).
Reinitializing an installed app led to an unnecessary image pull. This fix skips this pull to increase the reinitialization speed (50938).
Added support for app_id=version in the app parameter for the UMC app install functions (50931).
Added DockerInjectEnvFile parameter for env file support in docker compose apps (50898).
Installing certain Apps on a non-Master system did not work via UMC (50890).
Added PostgreSQL pg_hba configuration for docker compose networks (50858).
The error tracking for failed docker pull requests has been improved (50849).
The warning message indicating a potentially long installation time of container based apps has been removed (50814).
Errors in a cached response in the UMC module could lead to tracebacks. This has been fixed (50775).
During app installation there was a mix of pop-up dialogs and dedicated pages. These have been unified into an installation wizard (50771).
In some cases, an unsuccessful app installation was still acknowledged as successful. This fix ensures that the App Center receives a correct status code for those cases (49104).
Empty app settings are no longer set to None when using univention-app reinitialize (50718).
Warnings and errors during an app installation, removal or upgrade are now highlighted and grouped together (50667).
A Promise was evaluated as resolved too early due to an missing return which caused standby animations to end too early. This has been addressed (50649).

The startup performance of the UMC module has been improved. Listing all apps first shows the cached result of the previous query while a new query is being performed. When the new query is done the cache is updated and the result is shown in the browser (49675).
The App Center will now check the available disk space before installing an App (31796).
The command univention-app dev-test-setup has been added that installs components needed to run Selenium based app tests (50592).

section.title: &ucsUDM; UMC modules and command line interface

listitem.simpara: An internal syntax check allowed spaces in mail addresses. This fix ensures that spaces in mail addresses now get rejected (46599).
Prevent creating DHCP networks which break the DHCP service configuration (44135).
The listener module udm_extension has been migrated to dh_python. All existing UDM extensions are migrated during the package upgrade (50401).

section.title: Modules for system settings / setup wizard

listitem.simpara: Fixed symbolic link creation for host certificate (49036).
An issue in the joinscript 20univention-join.inst to create new host certificates has been fixed, which led to directories getting the wrong file permissions (49036).
In case of an error during license activation in an appliance, refer to an article in the support database (50951).
Activating an app appliance now also sends the &ucsUCRV;s uuid/system for analytical purposes (49555).

Added another diagnosis plugin 60_old_schema_registration.py: It searches for a defined set of LDAP schema files and offers to register them properly if they were added to the system using an outdated installation mechanism (50889).
An UMC diagnostic check has been added, which checks if &ucsUCRV; ldap/server/name points to the master domain controller on member servers (50191).
A module to check if the LDAP module memberOf is activated has been added (50599).
The package has been migrated to dh-python and Python 3 (50461).

The LDAP overlay slapo-lastbind can now be activated via the &ucsUCRV; ldap/overlay/lastbind which when activated stores the time-stamp of a successful bind to an LDAP server. The script /usr/share/univention-ldap/univention_lastbind.py can be used to store the youngest of these timestamps, from all reachable LDAP servers, into the extended attribute lastbind of a specified user (49700).
The init script for slapd now looks for running process only below parent PID 1 specifically. This allows running other slapd processes in containers (50616).
The script ldap-group-to-file used to run against the &ucsMaster; by default. We randomize the LDAP server selection now to distribute the load (50191).
The wording of the univention-updater help text has been corrected (47834).
The package now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support (49173).
An issue in a translation file caused a web link to not appear in case a password was expired or had to be reset (50884).

A new UDM attribute signLogouts for the UDM module saml/serviceprovider has been implemented. Its value determines whether to sign logout messages sent to this service provider. Its default value is True (49305).
Error messages in the SAML login dialog are now translated to German again (50619).
The Login without Single Sign On link on the login page can now be configured via the &ucsUCRV; umc/login/links/login_without_sso/.* (50610).

A link to the password changing functionality has been implemented in the SAML login dialog, which is shown when the user has to change his password or the password expired. The link target can be set with the &ucsUCRV; saml/idp/password-change-url (50594).
The Forgot your password? link on the login page can now be configured via the &ucsUCRV; umc/login/links/forgot_your_password/.* (50608).

The schema file and the ACL file for Fetchmail are now properly registered using the newer ucs_registerLDAPExtension. This prevents errors when a &ucsBackup; is promoted to be the new &ucsMaster; (50607).

In a fresh installation of univention-postgrey the files /etc/postgrey/whitelist_clients.local and /etc/postgrey/whitelist_recipients.local are not included in the Postgrey configuration, even though the corresponding &ucsUCRV; should force this. The creation of the .local files and the update of the Postgrey configuration has been rearranged to fix this problem (50647).
The package now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support (49174).
The timeout in univention-add-vhost has been increased (50936).
Make the package univention-apache-vhost a dependency of univention-apache rather than a recommendation. This way it gets installed by default; some Apps rely on it (50901).
Various RADIUS-related &ucsUCRV;s have received a description text (48709).
For the logfile /var/log/univention/radius_ntlm_auth.log an automatic logrotate functionality has been added to prevent over-sized logfiles on heavy duty RADIUS servers (50545).
The package now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support (49175).
Improve error messages (38736).
Fix many memory leaks, memory corruption and segmentation faults (49383).
Add Python 3 support (50475).
An issue in the &ucsUDL; module gencertificate.py to create new host certificates has been fixed, which led to directories getting the wrong file permissions (49036).
Unused Python code has been removed (49170).
The new &ucsUCRV; dhcpd/ldap/debug has been added for debugging the configuration from LDAP. If activated, it creates a log file named /var/log/dhcp-ldap-startup.log (49281).
Fixed a spelling mistake in the description of &ucsUCRV; dhcpd/options/ (46805).
Changed the default of nss/group/cachefile/check_member to false on new installations for improved performance (50904).
The script ldap-group-to-file used to run against the &ucsMaster; by default. We randomize the LDAP server selection now to distribute the load (50191).
Handle state VIR_DOMAIN_PMSUSPENDED (50580).
The package now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support (49171).
The &ucsADC; is now able to synchronize Kerberos hashes from the Active Directory to the UCS LDAP server. This update adds compatibility for the new feature to the &ucsS4C; (50492).
The group member cache handling has been improved to avoid unbound consumption of process memory (50644).
Microsoft Wireless/Wired Group Policy, IPsec policy and Software installation policy objects can now be synchronized between OpenLDAP and Samba 4 (49838).
Fix the check check_univention_ad_connector by adapting to the new process name introduced in 390 from 49168 (50676).
When synchronizing group members, the &ucsADC; now only adds/deletes the edited members instead of replacing the whole list of members in that group (50630).

The &ucsADC; is now able to synchronize Kerberos hashes from the Active Directory to the UCS LDAP server. This can be enabled by setting the new &ucsUCRV; connector/ad/mapping/user/password/kerberos/enabled=true. If this variable is not set the hashes will not be synchronized (50492).
Fix Python library path in prepare-new-instance. This fixes the feature to synchronize several Active Directory domains with one UCS directory service (50713).

It is now possible to filter out users from synchronization by setting the &ucsUCRV; connector/ad/mapping/user/ignorefilter to an LDAP filter. Every user matched by this LDAP filter will be ignored by the connector (50674).
The group member cache handling has been improved to avoid unbound consumption of process memory (50643).
The package now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support (49168).
